item.title: Seeking Native Speakers for a short Video collection - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for individuals who are fluent in any languages to participate in a short video (30 seconds - 2 minutes) collection project. As part of this project, you will be required to create 10 short videos in your native language. These videos will cover a range of topics and will be used for language learning purposes.

Objective :
The objective of the video collection project is to gather short videos from native speakers in their own languages. These videos help improve AI systems' understanding and generation of human-like speech across different languages and cultures, making interactions more natural and inclusive.


Posted On: June 29, 2024 05:11 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Acting, Female
Skills: Acting, Female
Country: India
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for Podcast - BASIC - Upwork
item.description:
Very straightforward job this.

I am starting a new podcast. We have recorded about 7 episodes so far.
We used two GoPros to record the video.
One facing the hosts and one facing the guests.
GoPros split the long hour recording up into multiple files.
Then the audio was recorded separately

I will clean up the audio
And send you the audio stems
And the video files from each go pro
For each of the episodes (each episode goes for about 30-60min)

I want you to sync the audio / video.
Then just do a basic cut of each episode
Where it just cuts back and forth between each camera based on who is talking.
Don't need any fancy cutting
Or captions
Or effects
As I will use software to create reels out of things if I need to

This could become a regular thing for you if the price is right for us
As we'll be doing many more episodes this year

Hourly Range: $3.00-$8.00
Posted On: June 29, 2024 04:45 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.description:
I have videos which I would like to make into a chiropractic adjustment video. Raws a shot and need to edit it for tiktok and ig reels. Example is  here: https://www.tiktok.com/@scoliolife.de/video/7280404325623549192?is_from_webapp=1&sender_device=pc&web_id=7382509895953024528

item.title: Video Editor - FAST turnaround UGC style videos for Meta Ads (Facebook, Instagram) - Upwork
item.description:
We are an ecommerce brand that does a lot of Meta advertising (Facebook/Instagram) and we are planning to start TikTok very soon.

Our most effective ads are UGC video style ads, so we are looking for an editor who can do fairly simple video editing for us for these UGC videos.

For the most part, this will involve adding captions and possibly our logo - so, pretty easy.  However some videos may require inserting product b-roll (still pretty straightforward).  

We are looking for someone who has a good feel for UGC ads and can turn things around FAST.  We will start with 2-3 videos that I need done right away, but if things go well, I would hope this could become a regular gig with a 1=2 videos per week.

Hourly Range: $5.00-$14.00
Posted On: June 29, 2024 04:25 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: FULL TIME Video Editor - Short Form - Upwork
item.description:
Hi there, we need $10 to $15 video edits for around 60 second videos. Do not apply if you have time restraints or charge more than $15 for high quality short form video edits up to 60 seconds.

We need edits EXACTLY like this and at this level - https://www.instagram.com/reel/C8vzN6-NEV-/


30+ videos a month are needed and I need the editor to be able to go through the webinar to pick the clips included in the price.

We are all video editors and understand what we are asking for. Please do not apply if you cannot make videos up to this level.

Should be able to edit 1 video a day minimum but there will be more work than that, I need back revisions quickly and the ability to move fast and urgent. I cannot be waiting days for 60 second edits. This has ability to expand and grow together with a lot of video editing and growth in our company.


Budget: $500
Posted On: June 29, 2024 04:16 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Social Media Management, Social Media Marketing, Instagram, Social Media Content Creation, Social Media Content, Instagram Story, Social Media Strategy, Content Strategy, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Social Media Management, Social Media Marketing, Instagram, Social Media Content Creation, Social Media Content, Instagram Story, Social Media Strategy, Content Strategy, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: United States
click to apply
